credits.title: Admhálacha agus Cuiditheoirí Scratch
credits.developers: Tá Scratch deartha agus forbartha ag an Lifelong Kindergarten Group ag an MIT Media Lab:
credits.moderators: Is iad modhnóirí Scratch a bhainistíonn agus a chuireann feabhas ar an gcomhphobal ar líne:
credits.previousBody: Tá go leor oibre tábhachtaí déanta ag baill den Fhoireann Scratch thar na blianta, ina measc: John Maloney (a bhí i gceannas ar fhorbairt an bhogearra le linn an chéad deich mbliana), Andrés Monroy-Hernández (a bhí i gceannas ar fhorbairt an chéad suíomh Scratch dírithe ar an bpobal), Ben Berg, Amos Blanton, Karen Brennan, Juanita Buitrago, Leo Burd, Gaia Carini, Kasia Chmielinski, Michelle Chung, Shane Clements, Hannah Cole, Sayamindu Dasgupta, Margarita Dekoli, Evelyn Eastmond, Dave Feinberg, Chris Graves, Megan Haddadi, Christina Huang, Tony Hwang, Abdulrahman Idlbi, Randy Jou, Saskia Leggett, Tim Mickel, Amon Millner, Ricarose Roque, Andrea Saxman, Jay Silver, Tammy Stern, Lis Sylvan, Claudia Urrea, agus Oren Zuckerman
credits.partnersBody: Paula Bontá agus Brian Silverman, Playful Invention Company (a chabhraigh le dearadh Scratch, fiú sular tugadh "Scratch" air).
credits.researchersBody: Tá Taighde ar Scratch á dhéanamh ag baill de Fhoireann Scratch MIT agus ag taighdeoirí in ollscoileanna eile, mar shampla Yasmin Kafai (comhoibrí ar an mbundeontas a fuair Scratch ón NSF) in Ollscoil Pennsylvania, Scoil Oideachais Iarchéime, Karen Brennan (atá i gceannas ar an togra ScratchEd) in Ollscoil Harvard, Scoil Oideachais Iarchéime, Benjamin Mako Hill in Ollscoil Washington, Andrés Monroy Hernández ag Microsoft Research, Mimi Ito agus Crystle Martin in Ollscoil California, Irvine, Quinn Burke i gColáiste Charleston, Deborah Fields in Ollscoil Utah State, agus Kylie Peppler in Ollscoil Indiana.
credits.acknowledgementsContributors: Ghlac na daoine seo a leanas páirt i bhforbairt Scratch thar na blianta freisin: Susan Abend, Robbie Berg, Lauren Bessen, Keith Braadfladt, Susan Carillo, Will Denton, Nathan Dinsmore, Catherine Feldman, Jodi Finch, Ioana Fineberg, JT Galla, Rachel Garber, Chris Garrity, Cassy Gibbs, Brian Harvey, Roland Hebert, Tracy Ho, Benjamin Howe, Kapaya Katongo, Evan Karatzas, Christine Kim, Joren Lauwers, Mike Lee, Jeff Lieberman, Mark Loughridge, Kelly Liu, Anthony Lu, Danny Lutz, David Malan, Wayne Marshall, John McIntosh, Paul Medlock-Walton, Dongfang (Tian) Mi, Ximena Miranda, Jens Moenig, Evan Moore, Geetha Narayanan, Kate Nazemi, Liddy Nevile, Wing Ngan, Derek O'Connell, Tim Radvan, Karen Randall, Ian Reynolds, Miriam Ruiz, Chinua Shaw, Ed Shems, Cynthia Solomon, Daniel Strimpel, Kilmer Sweazy, John Henry Thompson, Ubong Ukoh, Vladimir Vuksan, Han Xu, agus go leor aistritheoirí ó gach cearn den domhan a rinne obair an chapaill ar bhonn deonach.
credits.acknowledgementsCommunity: We greatly appreciate all of the contributions by members of the worldwide Scratch community, who have shaped the direction of Scratch by sharing their projects, comments, and ideas.
credits.acknowledgementsInfluencers: Tá ár gcuid oibre ar Scratch go mór faoi anáil Seymour Papert agus Alan Kay.
credits.supportersFinancialHeader: The following organizations have provided major financial support for Scratch:
credits.supportersServicesHeader: Soláthraíonn na heagraíochtaí seo a leanas a gcuid seirbhísí dúinn saor in aisce chun Scratch a choinneáil faoi lánseol:
credits.supportersOpenHeader: Scratch would not be possible without free and open source software, including:
